Entries.71550001/w sunny/j 14/z winter/z summer/: continue/64 15/farmer 64 16 2 Linus 64 18 0/pause 600/addQuest 5000005/skippable/speak Linus "... How are you?#$b#I hope i didn't surprise you....#$b#It hasn't been long since you came here, so I thought you might need some advice."/pause 500/speak Linus "Farm work is very hard work. You have to eat frequently to maintain stamina.#$b#There'll be a lot of Salmonberry around for a couple of days starting today.#$b#Salmonberries are sour, but they'll help you fill your hunger if nothing else."/pause 300/emote farmer 32/pause 300/speak Linus "Oh, and leave some Salmonberries for me and the animals.$h#$b#... Then I'll go back now. Good luck."/end dialogue Linus "There are often people who are worried that I might not get something to eat.#$b#However, in this area, there are many fruits like salmonberry open every season, so i don't have to starve. I'm always grateful to nature..."

Entries.71550002/w sunny/j 67/z spring/z summer/: continue/64 15/farmer 64 16 2 Elliott 64 18 0/pause 600/addQuest 5000020/skippable/speak Elliott "*huff and puff* @... I need your help urgently!#$b#My precious watch opal decoration is gone... That's what my grandfather left me.$s"/pause 500/emote Elliott 28/speak Elliott "I didn't go to a special place except reading a book in the library, drinking at the saloon, and contemplating on the beach as usual yesterday...$s#$b#I went back to the place I went to, but I can't find it if my eyes are weird.#$b#Can you help me find it? Do me a favor....$s"/pause 300/emote farmer 32/pause 300/speak Elliott "You're gonna help me? Thank you so much, @!$h#$b#I'll keep trying to find it. Please, come to me when you find it!"/end dialogue Elliott "@, Have you seen it yet...? I've been walking around too, but I can't find it. Where is it on earth?... *sigh*$s"

Entries.71550003/w sunny/j 95/z summer/z fall/y: continue/64 15/farmer 64 16 2 Gus 64 18 0/pause 600/addQuest 5000032/skippable/speak Gus "@, I know it was bad manners from the morning, but I came here for an urgent request!#$b#The flour I ordered at the Juju City Food Market was lost in transit.$a"/pause 500/speak Gus "I'm in big trouble because I was going to show everyone my special fried food on Friday.$s#$b#But i am busy preparing ingredients for cooking, so I don't have time to go looking for it....#$b#Help me get the 'Wheat Flour' back! Please!"/end dialogue Gus "I know it's a really sudden request, but you're the only one who can help! I beg of you!"

Entries.71550006/e 71550005/i 731/t 900 1800: playful/-1000 -1000/farmer 4 15 1 Sam 17 16 2/skippable/removeitem 731/removeQuest 5000028/viewport 17 16 true/move farmer 8 0 0/pause 500/doAction 12 14/move farmer 0 -2 1/move farmer 4 0 2/pause 1000/faceDirection Sam 0/pause 800/speak Sam "Oh. Hi @!#$b#... What was his reaction when you gave Sebastian a bug steak?$h"/move farmer 0 3 1/faceDirection Sam 3/emote farmer 56/speak Sam "He looked like he swallowed a shit? Hahaha! The plan was successful!$h"/pause 500/pause 500/emote Sam 56/speak Sam "hum? Is this a maple bar?!#$b#A reward for having a good time thanks to me?#$b#You're welcome! It's my favorite snack!$h#$b#And thank yo..."/pause 800/jump Sam 11/emote Sam 16/speak Sam "Yuck! It's not maple syrup. It's mayonnaise!?$a"/pause 800/emote Sam 12/speak Sam "You two made fun of me, didn't you!?$a"/pause 800/shake Sam 1000/speak Sam "...$a#$b#.....$a#$b#Hahaha! t was a really fun joke just now. I have no choice but to admit it!$h#$b#it's fun to play with you guys! Hahaha!!$h"/animate farmer false true 100 102 103/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 600/message "It was fun to play with Sam and Sebastian. It feels like I've gotten closer to them."/pause 1000/end

Entries.71550007/i 172/y 2/j 116: continue/31 13/farmer 31 13 0 Caroline 34 5 0 Pierre 27 7 2 Abigail 25 14 2/animate Abigail false true 100 16 16 17 17 18 18 19 19/pause 500/removeitem 172/removeQuest 5000039/skippable/pause 1000/viewport move 0 -2 3000/speed farmer 3/move farmer 0 -4 0/move farmer 1 0 1/move farmer 0 -4 0/faceDirection farmer 1/faceDirection Caroline 3/pause 1000/addObject 33 5 172/playSound woodyStep/showFrame 35/pause 500/showFrame 6/pause 400/emote Caroline 16/pause 600/speak Caroline "Oh, @. You came at the right time.#$b#All right, we're all set to clean up!#$b#Cleaning up is really annoying, but I didn't manage my house well because I was squatting all winter...$s"/pause 600/speak Caroline "But it's time to work hard. Pierre sweeps the floor and Abigail has to do the dishes!$h"/pause 600/stopAnimation Abigail 8/emote Abigail 16/textAboveHead Abigail "Oh... Thanks to you, it was really easy to clean the windows!$h"/pause 1000/end

Entries.71550008/i 805/j 146/y 2/w sunny/t 900 1: continue/73 82/farmer 71 76 2 Vincent 73 82 2 Jas 74 83 3/pause 500/removeitem 805/removeQuest 5000050/skippable/pause 1000/emote Vincent 28/pause 400/textAboveHead Jas "Cheer up..."/pause 600/speed farmer 2/move farmer 0 6 2/pause 600/faceDirection farmer 1/faceDirection Vincent 3/pause 500/speak Vincent "Hello, @!#$b#This is my friend Minguinho, whom I mentioned. Tree fertilizer?"/pause 600/speak Vincent "What? Thank you very much! Thank you!$h"/pause 1000/end

Entries.71550009/i 729/y 2/j 169/t 900 1800: continue/10 5/farmer 4 5 3 Sandy 2 5 1/pause 500/removeitem 729/removeQuest 5000055/skippable/pause 1000/emote Sandy 32/pause 400/speak Sandy "So...#$b#Is that a dish of Escargots?"/pause 400/jump farmer 8/pause 400/speak Sandy "it looks a little gross.. But it has a buttery smell to it.#$b#So I'll try it!"/pause 300/textAboveHead Sandy "...Yum-yum..."/pause 1200/shake Sandy 1500/pause 1200/emote farmer 60/pause 400/speak Sandy "Hmm... @, My review of the tasting is...#$b#... I think this is delicious! The texture is surprisingly good.$h"/pause 300/emote farmer 20/pause 300/emote Sandy 20/pause 300/speak Sandy "Honestly, it didn't seem like my taste, but it's really surprising.$h#$b#Thank you, @. It was a really fun experience to taste new food!$h#$b#And this is a reward! I heard it's precious, but sometimes rich travelers give me these as gifts. So don't feel pressured! *Smile*[74]"/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 600/message "I didn't know I would give food and get prismatic shard!"/pause 600/message "... Sandy seems to be a really mysterious friend."/pause 1000/end

Entries.71550010/j 186/y 2/w sunny/t 600 2200:
continue/64 15/farmer 64 16 2 Marnie 64 18 0/pause 600/addQuest 5000060/skippable/speak Marnie "Oh, i am out of breath...! *hup hup* ...$s#$b#I'm sorry to come here suddenly. But something really urgent happened to me.$s"/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak Marnie "I went to the shareholder's city because I had something to do, and I stopped by an antique shop.#$b#The store was selling cute chicken statues.#$b#Oh, you know Shane likes chicken, right?#$b#So I wanted to give the statue to Shane as a gift, so I bought it. But when I got home, it was gone.$s"/pause 500/emote Marnie 28/pause 500/emote farmer 60/pause 500/speak Marnie "I'm very strenuous of looking for it alone...$s#$b#So I had to ask you a favor, @... Would you please visit the statue for me?$s"/pause 600/jump farmer 6/pause 600/speak Marnie "Thank you so much for helping!
I thought you would help me!$h"/pause 600/speak Marnie "I remember holding the statue until I got off at the train station.#$b#I'll look it up under the mountain. I hope you find it on the mountain. Thank you, sweetheart!$h"/end dialogue Marnie "I wanted to make Shane happy, but I'm really upset. It was a really cute statue...$s"
